description: Equal to the sum of ascending numbers raised to its digits powers.
mathematica: A035138 = {}; Do[d = IntegerDigits[n]; If[Total[Range[Length[d]]^d] == n, AppendTo[A035138, n]], {n, 1000}]; A035138 (* _Jayanta Basu_ and _Giovanni Resta_, May 12 2013 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1998.
